Keywords: Asgardian , Past , Pirate , Spider-Man Family , Warrior
Real Name: Peter Parker
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters, Hindering
MY KIND OF ALLIES: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Pirate or Warrior keyword gain the Spider-Man Family keyword.
PLUNDER FOR MY WEB: Colossal Stamina, Steal Energy. // When Spider-Viking KO's an opposing character and an equipment is dropped, after resolutions he may equip it. (He would unequip any current equipment to do so.)
CALL IN HELP FROM THE SPIDER-VERSE!: When Spider-Viking hits an opposing character, if no character has been placed this turn, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 3-6: Place another friendly character with the Spider-Man Family keyword adjacent.
BERSERKER RAGE: Toughness. Spider-Viking takes a maximum of 1 damage from range attacks.

[QUOTE=KoalaInMexico;12064974]Am I understanding his special defense correctly? he takes no dmg from range attacks right? Takes a maximum of 1 from range wich is then reduced by toughness... Exospex for HSS and always keep distance[/QUOTE] I’ll preface this by saying I haven’t really played Heroclix in years and just stop by to occasionally look at new dials. However, there was a previous piece like this who raised some damage ruling questions, and it was resolved by saying he only takes 1 click of damage from range. So you deal him 3 ranged damage, it’s reduced by 1 from toughness to 2, then its reduced to 1 by the ability. I could be wrong, but I believe that’s how this works
